positive_examples: This is an example of political doctrine.
The political doctrine demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed political doctrine in this context.
A typical case of political doctrine would involve these features.
The concept of political doctrine applies here.
Systematic set of principles and beliefs that guide political ideology and governance.
negative_examples: This is an example of multinational doctrine, not political doctrine.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultinationalDoctrine, or other types of Doctrine

definition: A body of principles guiding political beliefs, policies, and governance.
